Solid State

House of Romanov

The facts about the ending of the Tsar and his family.

THE RUSSIAN REVOLUTION OF 1905 BEGINS

A peaceful protest by the Russian people concerning their difficult lifestyle, led by priest Father Gapon, starts the Russian Revolution of 1905.

Learn more

This overlay will be filled with images and text about event

END OF THE 1ST RUSSIAN REVOLUTION

The October Manifesto is signed by Czar Nicholas and promises to grant basic civil liberties such as freedom of speech and religion.

Learn more

This overlay will be filled with images and text about event

RUSSIAN REVOLUTION OF 1917 BEGINS

On Russia's National Women's Day, about 90,000 women march through Petrograd, shouting "Down With the Autocracy!" and "Stop the War!"

Learn more

This overlay will be filled with images and text about event

Family Matters

The following tiles talk more about the Romanov family and struggles that they had to endore before the revolution took there lives.

NICHOLAS II ABDICATES THE THRONE

Czar Nicholas II officially abdicates his position as czar of Russia.

Learn more

THE RUSSIAN CIVIL WAR BEGINS

The Bolshevik army, the Red Army, and anti-Bolshevik Russians, the White Army, fight a civil war for the former Russian Empire.

Learn more

THE ROMANOVS ARE KILLED

The royal family is murdered by the Bolshevik government at Ekaterinburg in the Urals.

Learn more

THE RUSSIAN CIVIL WAR ENDS

The Treaty of Riga ends the Russian Civil War. Lenin and the Communists gain full control over the Russian government.

Learn more

MISSING BODIES FROM ROMANOVS GRAVE

In 1991 it was confirmed that 2 bodies are missing from the location that the Romanovs grave site.

Learn more

IMPOSTERS AND EVIDENCE

As the news came out many people claimed to be the missing Prince and Princess.

Learn more
